result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail

result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht

result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: We spent the day on the beach.

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig

result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a ċaiṫ Rebekka an baḃla isteaċ sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
